title: Gift Nifty falls over 100 pts; here's trading setup for the day
summary: Indian stock markets moved sideways on Thursday. Investors adopted a cautious stance, awaiting new domestic cues. The Nifty index remained within a narrow band, struggling to break out. Analysts anticipate continued range-bound trading for the index. Select individual stocks may show strength. The India VIX, a fear gauge, saw a slight decrease.

title: Stocks in news: Tata Steel, Hero MotoCorp, Bharti Airtel, RIL, Nykaa
summary: Markets experienced a dip on Thursday, with analysts suggesting a buy-on-dips strategy for the Nifty above 25,400. Several companies like Tata Steel, Hero MotoCorp, Nykaa, Bharti Airtel, Tata Motors PV, RIL, and RVNL are in focus due to their recent financial results and business developments.

title: Asian stocks tumble as AI rout deepens, silver hammered
summary: Asian stocks extended losses for a second day, mirroring a Wall Street selloff driven by concerns over AI's impact on software profits and rising U.S. layoffs. Precious metals and cryptocurrencies also experienced significant volatility, with gold, silver, bitcoin, and ether all declining sharply.

title: Wall Street ends sharply down as AI worries weigh
summary: Wall Street closed sharply lower as tech giants like Microsoft and Amazon saw significant drops following Alphabet's announcement of doubled AI capital spending. Investors grew wary of hefty AI investments, fearing they may not translate into immediate revenue and profit boosts, impacting software stocks. The market saw a rotation into cheaper stocks as volatility increased.

title: Stock Radar: Bandhan Bank stock takes support above 50-DMA; time to buy?
summary: Bandhan Bank stock has bounced back, breaking out of its consolidation range after finding support above the 50-day moving average. Experts suggest short-term traders with a high-risk profile can buy the stock for a target of Rs 165 in the next 2-3 weeks, with a stop loss below Rs 153.

title: Indian stock market: 10 key things that changed overnight - Gift Nifty, US tech stocks rout, gold rate to Bitcoin price
summary: Gift Nifty was trading around 25,585 level, a discount of nearly 140 points from the Nifty futures’ previous close, indicating a negative start for the Indian stock market indices.

title: AI power play: How MTAR Technologies is fuelling the data center boom
summary: As the primary manufacturing partner for America’s Bloom Energy, MTAR is scaling up its ‘hotbox’ production to meet the skyrocketing needs of high-performance AI infrastructure.

summary: RBI MPC Meet 2026 LIVE: The RBI’s Monetary Policy Committee (MPC) - the rate setting panel - is widely expected to keep repo rates unchanged at 5.25%, with focus likely to remain on liquidity management and transmission.

title: Anand Rathi Wealth’s Feroze Azeez on what US tariff rollback means for Indian markets
summary: With the US easing tariffs on India, markets and the rupee have rallied. Anand Rathi Wealth’s Feroz Azeez explains why the impact goes beyond sentiment, when FIIs may return, and where investors should look next.

title: Motilal Oswal Group targets 10 owned office towers across major cities by 2028
summary: As most companies embrace co-working and asset-light models, Motilal Oswal Group is going the other way—investing heavily in owned office towers to build culture, trust and long-term value.

title: Mutual funds want commodity ETFs other than gold and silver. But is this feasible?
summary: Current regulations limit commodity ETFs to these two precious metals, but discussions are now underway between mutual funds and exchanges regarding other commodities, especially copper. However, several hurdles stand in the way.

title: Aye Finance to test IPO market even as non-bank peers prefer to wait
summary: Aye Finance has trimmed the offer size even as several NBFCs and microlenders delayed their IPOs amid sectoral pain and rising bad loans.

title: AI startups positioned to transform India's IT services, despite SaaS setbacks
summary: As global AI agents begin to automate legacy migrations, Indian IT firms face a valuation crisis, prompting venture capital firms like Lightspeed to hunt for entrepreneurs who can increase margins through automation.

title: Uber ordered to pay $8.5 million in trial over driver sex assault claims
summary: The case was the first trial – known as a 'bellwether' – of more than 3,000 similar lawsuits against Uber that have been consolidated in U.S. federal court. Bellwether trials are used to test legal theories and help gauge the value of claims for possible settlements.

title: It's all about hours clocked—Urban Company data punctures work value talk
summary: Urban Company's top 5% professionals spent an average of 167 hours a month working for the platform, nearly double the hours logged by the average Urban Company ‘partner’.

title: Reddit forecasts strong revenue as AI tools drive ad sales
summary: Q4 revenue rose 70% to $726 million, beating estimates of $665.4 million. Its earnings per share of $1.24 also exceeded estimates of 94 cents. Daily active unique visitors rose 19%, to 121.4 million in the quarter ended December 31, while its global average revenue per user increased by 42%.

title: Sensex, Nifty open little changed ahead of RBI MPC decision; mid, smallcaps slip
summary: Indian stock markets, Nifty and Sensex, began Friday trading with slight declines. This marks a second consecutive session of losses for the benchmark indices. Investors are adopting a cautious stance. This is due to the upcoming Reserve Bank of India's Monetary Policy Committee policy announcement later today. Global market sentiment also appears subdued.

title: RVNL shares in focus after Q3 profit rises 4% YoY to Rs 324 crore
summary: Shares of Rail Vikas Nigam Ltd (RVNL) will be in focus on February 6 after the state-owned rail infrastructure firm reported a modest 4% year-on-year rise in Q3FY26 net profit to Rs 324 crore. Revenue grew 3% to Rs 4,684 crore, while higher expenses capped margin expansion despite an increase in total income.

title: British International invests Rs 90 crore in UC Impower Fund
summary: British International Investment has invested Rs 90 crore in UC Impower, an India-focused early growth-stage equity fund, marking the largest commitment to the Rs 500 crore vehicle. The fund backs financial services and climate solution firms. UC Impower has raised about Rs 435 crore so far and plans to build a portfolio of 10–11 investments.

title: Bharti Airtel shares in focus after Q3 profit drops 55% YoY to Rs 6,630 crore. Buy, sell or hold?
summary: Bharti Airtel shares are in focus after a sharp year-on-year decline in profit despite strong revenue, EBITDA, and ARPU growth. India operations, home business expansion, lower capex, and reduced net debt supported performance. Brokerages remain positive, citing robust cash flows, subscriber additions, and improving operational metrics.

title: Exclusive | Why BofA's Amish Shah is booking profit in defence stocks after Budget
summary: BofA Global Research’s Amish Shah is booking profits in defence stocks after a sharp rally, citing stretched valuations despite a strong Budget capex push. Shah prefers rotating into rate-sensitive cyclicals and sees Nifty at 29,000 by December 2026, with earnings growth expected to accelerate in FY27.

title: Suzlon Energy shares in focus after Q3 profit rises 15% YoY to Rs 445 crore
summary: Suzlon Energy reported a 15% year-on-year rise in Q3FY26 profit to Rs 445 crore, supported by strong revenue growth, higher volumes, and margin expansion. The company posted record deliveries, a robust order book, and a net cash position, reinforcing confidence in its clean energy growth strategy.

title: Stocks to buy in 2026 for long term: Emami, Solar Industries among 5 stocks that could give 10-50% return
summary: Brokerage houses have identified select stocks across FMCG, defence manufacturing, housing finance, and staffing services as long-term investment opportunities for 2026. Recommendations on Emami, Solar Industries, Aptus Value Housing Finance, Devyani International, and TeamLease Services indicate potential returns ranging from 10% to 50%, backed by earnings visibility and valuation comfort.

title: LIC shares in focus after Q3 profit rises 17% YoY to Rs 12,930 crore
summary: Life Insurance Corporation of India's shares are in focus after a strong December quarter. The company reported a 17% year-on-year rise in net profit to Rs 12,930 crore. Net premium income also saw a 17% increase. The Value of New Business grew by nearly 28%. LIC's solvency ratio improved, and assets under management increased by over 8%.

title: Sebi proposes tighter rules for single-stock derivatives strategy
summary: India's market regulator Sebi is proposing new margin rules for single-stock derivatives. The changes will affect trading strategies involving different expiry dates. Specifically, benefits from offsetting positions will not be available on the day a contract expires. This move aims to reduce risks for traders and trading members.

title: Tata Motors PV shares in focus after Q3 loss widens to Rs 3,486 crore on JLR cyber incident
summary: Tata Motors Passenger Vehicles Ltd shares will be in spotlight reported a significant consolidated loss of Rs 3,486 crore in Q3, primarily due to a cyber incident at Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) which impacted revenue by 26%. Despite challenges, the company anticipates a strong recovery in the fourth quarter with JLR's normalization and continued domestic growth.

title: Technical snag at NSDL delays settlement of trades since Tuesday
summary: A technical issue at National Securities Depository has disrupted share settlements for three days. Investors' purchased shares are not appearing in their demat accounts. This prevents them from selling these holdings. The problem stems from NSDL's inability to process inter-depository transfers. This impacts the routine movement of securities between depositories. Operations are delayed as a result.

title: Stocks to buy: Rajesh Palviya of Axis Sec suggests Birlasoft, SAIL, Adani Energy shares today
summary: On Friday, the Nifty 50 and Sensex began the day unchanged amid anticipation of the central bank's policy decision. Most sectors were in the red, and the indices are likely to continue their sideways trend unless they break the resistance levels above 26,000-26,400.

title: Silver rate today falls 6% on MCX on strong US dollar, tech rout - Right time to buy?
summary: Silver rates fell 6% on February 6, marking a second consecutive session of losses due to a global selloff in tech stocks and a stronger U.S. dollar. Prices on MCX reached  ₹2,29,187 per kg, leading to a nearly 16% weekly decline.

title: Gold rate crashes 2% on MCX on profit booking; RBI MPC outcome in focus; experts highlight key levels to watch
summary: Gold rate declined sharply on Friday. MCX gold April futures dropped by nearly  ₹2,700, or almost 2%, to  ₹1,49,396 per 10 grams, while MCX silver March contracts crashed by  ₹14,600, or 6%, to  ₹2,29,187 per kg.

title: Walmart Pharmacy pay increase: How much will employees earn now? Who is eligible?
summary: In a press release, Walmart said that 3,000 pharmacy technician roles were elevated to operations team lead positions, increasing their average pay to $28 per hour from $22.

summary: India's largest lender is expected to report steady margins and stable asset quality in its December-quarter earnings.
